name: 黑龙江职业学院
accountSelector: body > div:nth-child(1) > div > div.loginWrap > div > div.loginCenter > div > div:nth-child(1) > input[type=text]
passwordSelector: body > div:nth-child(1) > div > div.loginWrap > div > div.loginCenter > div > div:nth-child(2) > input[type=password]
loginBtnSelector: body > div:nth-child(1) > div > div.loginWrap > div > div.loginBottom > button
